original_text: Early on the first day of the week, while it was still dark, Mary Magdalene went to the tomb and saw that the stone had been removed from the entrance.
korean_text: 안식 후 첫날 일찍이 아직 어두울 때에 막달라 마리아가 무덤에 와서 돌이 무덤에서 옮겨진 것을 보고

sentences.original_text: Early on the first day of the week
Mary Magdalene went to the tomb
and saw that the stone had been removed
sentences.korean_translation: 그 돌이 무덤에서 옮겨진 것을 보았다
